articles.title: Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Terminal of Pyongyang Int'l Airport
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Gives Field Guidance to Construction Site of Terminal of Pyongyang Int'l Airport
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, gave field guidance to the construction site of the Terminal of Pyongyang International Airport.
					 After being briefed on its construction in front of the maps showing its bird's eye view and development and ichnography, he went round the exterior and interior of Terminal No. 2 to learn about the progress made in it.
					
					 Noting that the soldier-builders have successfully carried out the construction of the terminal as intended by the party, he said he was pleased with their work. Praising them for having done a lot of work, he indicated the tasks to be fulfilled to wind up the construction and ways to do so.
					
					 Stressing that the Terminal of Pyongyang International Airport is like a gateway to Pyongyang and the face of the country, he underscored the need to build it as a proud edifice in the era of the Workers' Party both in architectural style and contents and as befitting the appearance of the highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 It is important to firmly preserve the Juche character in architecture, he said, instructing officials to introduce the world trend and good experience of other countries into the construction of the terminal and, at the same time, make sure that national identity is preserved in it. 
					
					 He underscored the need to build the arrival lounge, the lounge for departure formalities, departure lounge, resting lounge, interview room and restaurant, etc. for the best convenience of passengers and to be impeccable in the aspects of architectural beauty and formative art.
					
					 He underlined the need to equip the terminal with all modern facilities and build service facilities in a peculiar manner and make thorough arrangements for service from now. He proposed a measure for preparing the staff to improve the service and specified tasks and ways for doing so. 
					
					 He called for building more service facilities including hotel and bus stops near the terminal and energetically pushing forward a project for face-lifting the environment of the area of Sunan where the terminal is located. 
					
					 He stressed the need for the soldier-builders to enhance their responsibility and role and for the Cabinet, the ministries and national institutions to render positive material and moral assistance to the builders in order to finish the construction of the terminal as scheduled.
					
					 Noting that the construction of Terminal No. 2 of the airport is the project to which the party pays particular attention, he expressed expectation and conviction that the soldier-builders would successfully complete the project qualitatively and thus build the terminal as an impeccable monumental edifice in the era of Songun.
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice Marshal of the KPA Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, and KPA Lieut. General Ma Won Chun, director of the Designing Department of the NDC.

articles.title: State Funeral of Jon Pyong Ho Held
articles.content:
State Funeral of Jon Pyong Ho Held
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A state funeral was held here on Thursday for Jon Pyong Ho, general of the Korean People's Army and honorary curator of the KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So and other members of the state funeral committee, officials of the party and armed forces organs, the Cabinet, the field of national defence industry and the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the bereaved families of the deceased.
					
					 Members of the funeral committee and the bereaved families observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.
					
					 The coffin was carried amid the playing of a dirge.
					
					 The hearse left for the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery.
					
					 Along the route citizens expressed deep condolences over the loss of Jon Pyong Ho who devoted himself to the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche, the revolutionary cause of Songun till the last moments of his life, possessed of intense loyalty to the party and the leader.
					
					 A ceremony of bidding the last farewell to the deceased took place at the cemetery.
					
					 KPA General Hyon Yong Chol, minister of the People's Armed Forces, made a eulogy
					
					 He said: The death of such a veteran revolutionary as Jon Pyong Ho is a big loss to the WPK and the Korean people because he passed away at a time when the dignity and might of the DPRK are being fully demonstrated and a bright prospect for the Korean revolution is unfolding thanks to the Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Though Jon Pyong Ho passed away, the feats he performed for the party and the revolution, the country and its people will last forever.
					
					 The remains of the deceased were buried in the grave.
					
					 The bereaved families of the deceased and members of the state funeral committee spread earth on the grave.
					
					 Placed before the grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also laid were wreaths from the C.C., the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the DPRK Cabinet, the General Political Bureau of the KPA, the General Staff of the KPA, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and various other institutions.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the deceased.

articles.title: Condolences Expressed over Death of Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Condolences Expressed over Death of Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju and other members of the state funeral committee and officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, those in the field of national defence and those of the party and power bodies in Pyongyang visited the bier of Jon Pyong Ho, general of the Korean People's Army and honorary curator of the KPA Museum of Weapons and Equipment, and expressed condolences over his death.
					 Seen standing before the bier was a wreath sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Placed before the bier were wreaths in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Central Military Commission of the WPK, the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, the Cabinet of the DPRK, the General Political Bureau of the KPA, the General Staff of the KPA, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, field of national defence industry and party and powers bodies, factories, etc. in Pyongyang.
					
					 The mourners observed a moment's silence to the memory of Jon Pyong Ho who devoted his life to the sacred struggle to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun, true to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed profound condolences to the bereaved families of the deceased.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju Meets Japanese Dietmen's Delegation
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju Meets Japanese Dietmen's Delegation
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kang Sok Ju, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) who is advisor to the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, Friday had a talk with the Japanese dietmen's delegation headed by Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors, on a visit to the DPRK.
					 Present there were Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the C.C, the WPK who is chairman of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, officials concerned, Members of the House of Representatives Kenta Matsunami, Takashi Ishizeki and Naoto Sakaguchi and Members of the House of Councilors Takayuki Shimizu and Taro Yamada, who are dietmen from different political parties of Japan, and members of the Sports Peace Community Association of Japan.

articles.title: Japanese Dietmen's Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Dietmen's Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese dietmen's delegation headed by Kanji Inoki, member of the House of Councilors, Friday visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the story about the old home in Mangyongdae, members of the delegation went round historic relics preserved there with much care.
					
					 At the end of the visit the guests made entries in the visitor's book.
					
					 Members of the delegation also visited the Mirim Riding Club and the Munsu Water Park on the same day.

articles.title: Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
articles.content:
Message to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on July 7.
					 The message said:
					
					 Your Excellency Comrade First Secretary
					
					 Members of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea and its supporters held a meeting for remembering HE Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, as in the past on July 7, 2014 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 On this anniversary I pay most heartfelt tribute to Your Excellency and, through Your Excellency, to the Workers' Party of Korea and all the Korean people on behalf of President Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder-chairman of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea.
					
					 I pay highest tribute to HE President, the greatest sage who devoted his all to the liberation of the Korean people and the defense of their sovereignty.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I wish Your Excellency and your party and people happiness and good success.
					
					 Please accept my highest regards.

articles.title: Delegation of Vietnam General Confederation of Labor Leaves for Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Vietnam General Confederation of Labor Leaves for Home
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Vietnam General Confederation of Labor led by Vice-President Mai Duc Chinh left here for home on Friday.

articles.title: Anti-Drought Campaign Conducted in DPRK
articles.content:
Anti-Drought Campaign Conducted in DPRK
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A brisk campaign is still going on in the DPRK to reduce the damage from long drought.
					The persistent drought in most areas of the country, including North and South Hwanghae provinces and Nampho City, has badly affected the grain production.
					
					Under the situation, the Ministry of Agriculture and provincial, city and county agricultural guidance organs and co-op farms concentrated all means and efforts on the combat against drought.
					
					A measure was taken to make an effective use of electricity in the countryside. Keeping various kinds of water pumps and sprinklers in full capacity operation, servicepersons and civilians across the country have turned out in a drive to water paddy and non-paddy fields.
					
					Big efforts were given to utilizing to the full wells and pools and securing water resources.
					
					The farms strive to lessen the rate of water evaporation from dry fields as much as possible through plowing and urge the water caretakers to ensure the management of rice-paddy irrigation in a responsible manner.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Always Remembered by World's Progressive People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Always Remembered by World's Progressive People
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- It is one of undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung that he had made great contributions to achieving the cause of global independence.
					 The President had always attached great importance to developing the anti-imperialist national liberation movement in other countries.
					
					 In the latter half of the 1950s when the DPRK had a hard time of postwar reconstruction, the President rendered sincere assistance to the Algeria people in their struggle for national liberation against imperialism.
					
					 In the early 1960s when the U.S. created the "Caribbean crisis" in a bid to foil the Cuban revolution, he gave all sorts of assistances to the Cuban people.
					
					 During the Vietnamese war, Kim Il Sung took all measures to assist materially and morally the Vietnamese people in their national salvation war against the U.S., while sending the air force of the Korean People's Army and supplying millions of military uniforms to Vietnam. Deeply moved by his revolutionary fidelity, former Vietnamese President Ho Chi Minh praised Kim Il Sung as a savior and his brother.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had fully supported the Cambodian and Laotian peoples in their national salvation struggle against the U.S. and the national liberation struggle in colonial countries like Angola, Mozambique, Zimbabwe and Namibia.
					
					 The first Namibian President Sam Nujoma said it was entirely ascribable to Kim Il Sung's support that Namibia could achieve its independence. 
					
					 Former Mozambican President Samora Moises Machel said that his people could throw off the fetters of slave as they waged a resolute struggle in the way indicated by Kim Il Sung, a great hero.

articles.title: U.S. Decline and Ruin Are Inevitability of History: KCNA White Paper
articles.content:
U.S. Decline and Ruin Are Inevitability of History: KCNA White Paper
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released white paper "Decline and Ruin of the U.S. Are Inevitability of History".
					 Since the demise of the Cold War era, the U.S., obsessed by the ambition for building a uni-polar world, ignited wars in different parts of the world without hesitation and stained the world arena with high-handed practices and unilateral policies, the white paper said, and went on:
					
					 When Bush doctrine reached the extremes, not a few conservative scholars and politicians of the U.S. let loose such sophism as "American-style peace" and "American empire" in a bid to build public opinion.
					
					 The U.S. administration openly said that the future U.S. will be related to Asia-Pacific and the future Asia-Pacific depends on the U.S. and that no other country will be able to dominate Asia-Pacific, openly disclosing its hegemonic scenario for the region.
					
					 This met an immediate strong rebuff of regional countries and proved to be total bankrupt.
					
					 Referring to the U.S. new strategy, foreign media said that differences exist not only in U.S. Congress but in the Democratic Party over Obama's strategic plan and its implementation. Obama's strategy has faced three challenges called "imbalance of resources", "imbalance of energy" and "imbalance of power," they added.
					
					 The U.S. hegemonic position is sinking in different parts of the world.
					
					 The Russian magazine Expert said that the U.S. military edge will be contained and disappear in the end due to the regional conflict in which this country is locked, adding that the U.S. is being restricted in the sphere of its action where he employed all possible means such as alliance, division, estrangement and engagement over geo-political issues. The U.S. obviously lack of power.
					
					 The U.S. is at its wits' end over the civil war sweeping Iraq.
					
					 As for the issue of Afghanistan, the U.S. is also finding itself in a quagmire.
					
					 The U.S. is in a weak position in the all-out confrontation with Russia over the issue of Ukraine. The U.S. is wielding a sanctions stick against Russia but is proving to be counterproductive as the latter is maintaining its hard-line stand not to compromise over its national interests even a bit.
					
					 China and India are opposed to the sanctions.
					
					 The U.S. is hard hit, isolated and rejected worldwide amid the anti-American spirit mounting worldwide. The U.S. is also out of favor with its allies.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the U.S. is paying a high price for its wars and interventions worldwide and that its position as the "super power" remains in its name only.
					
					 The U.S. has long regarded dollars as one of twin pillars supporting its ambition for world domination along with its nuclear weapons.
					
					 The U.S. economy relying on dollars is on the verge of a slump.
					
					 The financial crisis that hit the U.S. in 2008 is precipitating its economic doom.
					
					 As regards this economic situation, the international credit estimation organization lowered the U.S. credit grade for the first time in 70 years.
					
					 Foreign media warns this is a big blow at the "heart" of the U.S. economy and that the U.S. economy will face the "second recession", adding that now is the time for the U.S. to repent of its hegemonic way of thinking and actions as it is driven into a tight corner in terms of economy.
					
					 Its state debt and budgetary deficit are out of control now.
					
					 Due to serious financial shortage, the U.S. government is undergoing unprecedented difficulties and evil cycle of financial bankruptcy, federal government's automatic expenditure cutback, government shutdown and default on debts. The value of the U.S. dollar is sharply sinking.
					
					 The U.S. dollar has faced its third crisis in the 21st century.
					
					 So the present international financial system based on the U.S. dollar is rapidly collapsing.
					
					 Russia is directing big efforts to expanding the scope of use of ruble.
					
					 Last year an agreement on exchange of currency was concluded between the Chinese People's Bank and the European Central Bank.
					
					 To counter the U.S. persistent financial sanctions the Iranian government declared that it would stop the oil dealing by the U.S. dollar and from 2012 it is receiving part of the funds for oil exports in national currency of relevant countries.
					
					 BRICS, a multi-national cooperative body made up of Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa put up the slogan of building more equal and fair world, and is exerting positive efforts to this end.
					
					 ALBA nations of Latin America officially use their common currency Sukre as currency for trade among its member nations and it is expected that all countries in the continent will introduce the currency in the future.
					
					 Five countries in the western area of the African continent decided to use common currency for the establishment of Western African currency zone and the member nations of the South Africa Development Community announced a plan to set up a single currency by 2018.
					
					 Besides this, oil producing countries in the Gulf region discussed the introduction of single currency in the Mid-east. Efforts are being made in different parts of the world to introduce single currency.
					
					 This trend of multi-polarization in the financial field would destroy the U.S.-led international economic system affected by pressure and arbitrary practices and lead to the establishment of a new order based on justice, equality and democracy.
					
					 Gone are the days when the U.S. swayed over the world economy by brandishing dollars and the dollar empire is sure to collapse any time.
					
					 The U.S. is on the verge of ruin due to the fin de siecle lifestyle in the material life as well as mental and cultural life.
					
					 The U.S. capitalists are widely spreading reactionary ideology and culture and corrupt bourgeois lifestyle to benumb the independent awareness of the toiling masses and make them slave of money subservient to them.
					
					 The U.S. is systematically training criminals at "gangsters university" and "pickpockets school" unprecedented in history.
					
					 All kinds of crimes like gun-related crimes and drug crimes are everyday occurrences among Americans who are corrupt in their mental and cultural life.
					
					 Gun-related crimes have become an incurable disease. 
					
					 Drug-related crimes have become another headache in the U.S.
					
					 The education in the U.S. is all the more deplorable.
					
					 Anti-Wall Street demonstration that took place in 2011 is the largest-ever anti-capitalist struggle in the U.S. history, an inevitable product of the extremely acute social and class contradictions.
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the collapse of "American empire" is becoming a reality.

articles.title: North, South of Korea Should Make Big Stride toward Future: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
North, South of Korea Should Make Big Stride toward Future: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- In order to improve the worsening inter-Korean relations and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity from the stand of By Our Nation Itself, the issues raised in the statement of the DPRK government following the special proposal of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK should be solved without fail, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is the unshakable stand and will of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations and open the way of national reunification.
					
					 The north and the south should open the way to improve the relations from a new viewpoint and new stand for the destiny of the nation.
					
					 For the north and the south to get reconciled and united for national reunification, not to antagonize and confront with each other, is the only way out for the Korean nation. whiling away time, being obsessed with narrow-minded interests of individual group and deep-rooted mistrust in fellow countrymen, while turning one's face away from the disgrace and misfortune the nation is suffering, means mocking at the desire of the nation for reunification and perpetrating the crimes to be cursed by the rising generations.
					
					 The north and the south should hew out the destiny and future of the fellow countrymen in a responsible manner by shouldering upon themselves the dignity and honor of the nation. Rise and fall of the country and life and death of the nation fully rest with the authorities of the north and the south. The north and the south should make a big stride forward a new future with the will to break with the inglorious past.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should remove prejudice and unnecessary doubt and positively respond to the special proposal and the statement of the DPRK government reflecting its sincerity. They should neither see fellow countrymen in the north through sun glasses given by foreign forces nor approach the inter-Korean relations with the thought of flunkeyism and submission.

articles.title: DPRK Will Make Positive Efforts for Settling Population Issue: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Make Positive Efforts for Settling Population Issue: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will make positive efforts to solve the population issue, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article dedicated to World Population Day.
					 The UN Population Fund raised the theme of World Population Day this year as "Investing in Young People", calling upon every country to pay deeper social attention to young people and pool efforts so that they can receive high-level education, advance into society in good health and give fullest play to their ability, the paper notes, adding:
					
					 Diverse activities are under way in the DPRK on World Population Day.
					
					 Colorful events including a seminar on the theme "Investing in Young People" are being held in the presence of officials of relevant organs and representatives of international bodies.
					
					 The Population Centre of the DPRK published a special issue of Population Newsletter helpful to settling the population issue in cooperation with the UN Population Fund.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever make positive efforts to settle the population issue and attain the UN millennium development goals and strengthen cooperation with international bodies.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Crack down on Reunification Movement of KCTU
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Crack down on Reunification Movement of KCTU
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency searched houses of the former chairman for reunification and the incumbent director for reunification of the Korean Confederation of Trade Unions (KCTU) on July 9, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 That day the police took such action on charges that they produced and distributed book "I ask the workers to work for reunification" the KCTU made in 2012 for its unionists.
					
					 It did such actions, asserting that the KCTU's contact with the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification was a violation of the "Security Law".

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Blast S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Blast S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. on July 8 issued a statement condemning the south Korean regime for its crackdown on the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), the pro-reunification organization.
					 The statement said that the present regime has ceaselessly suppressed the organization since it took office.
					
					 This is aimed at preventing the organization from waging the pro-reunification movement by eliminating all its members and dissolving it in the end, the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The organization has conducted its activities in full support of the three principals of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity.
					
					 The organization has devoted itself to the peace and reunification of the country since its formation.
					
					 The south Korean regime deserves the people's punishment for such brutal actions as suppressing the activities of the organization by invoking the "Security Law" and throwing its figures into prison.
					
					 The regime should bear in mind that it cannot quell even the will to dedicate oneself to reunification behind bars.
					
					 If the regime is not a group of traitors to the nation, it must halt inhumane and imprudent suppression of the elder figures of the organization at once.
					
					 It can never block the great long journey of the Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for the reunification of the nation.

articles.title: Frantic Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon under Fire
articles.content:
Frantic Suppression of South Headquarters of Pomminryon under Fire
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) --The south Korean authorities are now getting more frantic in their suppression of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon), according to Thongil News, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Over 20 policemen of the Seoul Metropolitan Police Agency on July 2 searched Ra Chang Sun, honorary chairperson of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, on a road side in broad daylight.
					
					 They were busy with a search operation against Ra for several hours, allegedly seizing evidence.
					
					 The Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office conducted an investigation into Ri Song Gun, advisor to the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, on June 10 and 18, pressurizing him to declare his conversion.
					
					 Meanwhile, the public security authorities searched the house of Kim Yong Sung, advisor to the organization, and conducted a series of investigation into him from long ago for the mere reason that he sent Ro Su Hui, vice-chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, to Pyongyang. They are busy with the action to indict Kim.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are still keeping Ri Kyu Jae, chairman of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon, Ro Su Hui and Ri Kyong Won, its former secretary general, behind bars. These days they are staging trials of at least 10 leading members of the organization including acting Chairman Kim Ul Su.
					
					 As regards the above-said suppression, a personage concerned of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon denounced the authorities for indiscriminately cracking down upon figures of Pomminryon, regardless of their ages, health condition and sex. Executive members of the organization were subject to suppression in the past but now the spearhead of crackdown is directed to elders this year, he deplored.
					
					 He accused the investigation authorities of keeping the core members of not only the organizations for the reunification movement but civic and public organizations under constant watch by a cunning method.

articles.title: Anniversary of Publication of July 4 Joint Statement Observed by Organization of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Anniversary of Publication of July 4 Joint Statement Observed by Organization of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Japanese Regional Committee of the Overseas Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration carried an ad in the south Korean newspaper Hangyore on the occasion of the 42nd anniversary of the publication of the July 4 joint statement.
					 The organization said it carried the ad for the purpose of sparking off bitterer accusations against the south Korean present regime which put the south-north relations to rock bottom in violation of the agreement with the north on halting slanders and calumnies against the other side and continues the suppression of progressive organizations for national reunification and their officials.
					
					 In the ad the organization demanded the south Korean authorities stop at once the suppression of the Unified Progressive Party and progressive organizations for national reunification, set free the arrested pro-reunification officials, lift the "May 24 step" and ensure the NGOs' movement for national reunification.
					
					 It called for bringing about an epochal phase of mending the south-north relations under the unfurled banner of the three principles of national reunification--independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity--and the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Japan's Moves to Revive Aggressor State under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Moves to Revive Aggressor State under Fire
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1134th Wednesday rally outside the Japanese embassy in Seoul on July 9.
					 Present there were victims of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, members of the Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society and other civic and public organizations.
					
					 At the rally speakers termed the Japanese government's reinterpretation of the constitution an attempt to scrap Article 9 of the Pacifist Constitution which stipulates the renouncement of war and bans the possession of army and revive the past aggressor state.
					
					 Japan claims if south Korea does not allow, Japan's armed forces do not enter south Korea but, those forces will be hurled into the Korean peninsula, in actuality, if the U.S. requests the dispatch of the "Self-Defense Forces" in contingency now that the U.S. forces have the right to command wartime operation of south Korea, they held.
					
					 The Japanese government announced the results of the review of the 1993 Kono statement, claiming that its wording was adjusted with the south Korean authorities when it was being worked out, an indication that it tries to evade the responsibility for the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army by describing the Kono statement as a product of a political compromise, they charged.
					
					 They denounced the review of the Kono statement as a serious human rights abuse against the victims of the sexual slavery and a blatant provocation against the international community calling for a halt to the violence against the women.

articles.title: "Our Nation's Forum" Held in Nagano Prefecture, Japan
articles.content:
"Our Nation's Forum" Held in Nagano Prefecture, Japan
Tokyo, July 10 (KNS-KCNA) -- "Our Nation's Forum" was held in Matsumoto City, Nagano Prefecture, Japan on July 6 to defend and glorify the tradition of national education as required by the new era with the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan as the main player.
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Pak Ku Ho, vice-chairman of its Central Standing Committee, Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of its Central Standing Committee and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, O Min Hak, director of the Economy Department of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Kim Thae Ryong, chairman of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, leading officials of organizations and enterprises of Chongryon, Ri Kwang Sang, chairman of the Nagano Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, and other chairmen of headquarters, officers and members of the Korean youth commercial associations across Japan, principals of Korean schools in Japan, Korean compatriots and students in Japan and officials of several organizations of Japan including the Nagano Prefec
					
					 tural People's Council for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, more than 2 000 in all.
					
					 Screened at the forum were videos showing the activities of the preceding generation who defended and developed national education and the life of students.
					
					 The forum set forth the tasks facing the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan to defend and glorify the tradition of national education and ways to do so.
					
					 Introduced there were activities for national education conducted by the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Nagano Prefecture.
					
					 The participants vowed to contribute to developing the Korean community in Japan and national education.
					
					 Chon Yong Min, chairman of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Nagano Prefecture, in a speech underscored the need to defend Korean schools at any cost, calling upon the association to become the main player and defend and glorify the tradition of national education as required by the new era.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said that the association should preserve and develop national education in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Korean in U.S.
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Korean in U.S.
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Ro Kil Nam, representative of Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., released an article praising President Kim Il Sung who gave a steady continuity to the history of single-minded unity and the ever-victorious history.
					 The President made the history and tradition of single-minded unity unprecedented in human history, the article said, and went on:
					
					 It is twenty years since he passed away.
					
					 He devoted his whole life to the independence, sovereignty and reunification of the country.
					
					 The document signed by him on July 7, 1994, the last period of his life, is one related to the north-south summit for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The compatriots in the north have lived, always holding him in high esteem.
					
					 There are more than 200 countries on the earth but it is only the north which can be singled out as the most closely united society among them.
					
					 The President rallied the compatriots in the north as one and turned the DPRK into the world's only country which achieved single-minded unity.
					
					 The DPRK is now standing high as a politico-ideological and military power and a scientific and technological power thanks to its single-minded unity.
					
					 That's why the compatriots in the north note with pride that single-minded unity is more powerful than any nuclear weapon.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Works Are Treasure for Progressive Humankind: Figure of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Works Are Treasure for Progressive Humankind: Figure of DR Congo
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- It is twenty years since President Kim Il Sung passed away, but the Juche idea founded by him is now shining more brightly as the guiding idea of humankind and famous works authored by him while taking the untrodden socialist road serve as the valuable treasure for progressive humankind struggling for independence.
					 Andre Lohekele Kalonda, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo who is secretary general of the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, said this at the ceremony of releasing the work of supreme leader Kim Jong Un held on July 2.
					
					 He said:
					
					 It is the most sacred duty of progressive humankind to hold Kim Il Sung as the sun of Juche in high esteem for all ages as he glorified the 20th century.
					
					 He devoted his all to building a new world free from exploitation and oppression and a socialist state in which the ideal and dream of the people are being realized on the highest level, possessed of broad magnanimity and gifted wisdom. He earned fame not only in Korea but in the world.
					
					 We do not doubt that though the President passed away, he will be always alive as the sun of humankind, and accept the validity of Kim Jong Un's work from the bottom of our hearts.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Chilean, Ghanaian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Chilean, Ghanaian Personages
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Chilean and Ghanaian personages made public statements on July 4 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Eduardo Artes, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Chile (Proletarian Action), said:
					
					 The immortal banner held high by President Kim Il Sung is now fluttering in the standoff with the imperialists. 
					
					 The President, who embarked upon the road of struggle for the country and people in his teens, created the immortal Juche idea soon after he started his revolutionary activities. 
					
					 The banner of Juche held high by the President serves as a great motive power for the Korean people who are ceaselessly achieving amazing successes in the socialist construction while firmly preserving the independent stand, and for the world progressives struggling for global independence. 
					
					 Although two decades have passed since the President's demise, his idea and exploits have eternal vitality.
					
					 The deputy general secretary of the National Democratic Congress of Ghana said that Kim Il Sung was the greatest man who turned the DPRK into a socialist country envied by world progressives with his outstanding idea and leadership. 
					
					 His august name is kept in the hearts of the people of African countries for the distinguished contributions he made to the national independence and development of those countries.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepali Paper
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Nepali newspaper Arpan on July 3 carried an editorial article titled "Remembering the great leader" to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung (July 8). 
					 The paper said:
					
					 The Juche idea created by the great leader President Kim Il Sung indicates the principles of independence in politics, self-support in economy and self-reliance in national defence. 
					
					 All people admire the development and progress being made in the DPRK where the Juche idea is successfully applied. 
					
					 This can be said a fruition of the great idea and line. 
					
					 A great development was made in the field of culture thanks to the Juche idea and school youth and children of the DPRK are learning to their hearts' content and bringing their wishes into bloom under the compulsory free education system.
					
					 The eye-opening successes in all the fields of the DPRK including politics, economy and culture are proud and brilliant results of the Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 The Korean nation which has lived as a homogeneous nation using one and the same language in one territory should never live separated any longer and the tragedy of division forced by outside forces should be put an end. 
					
					 It is the long-cherished desire of the Korean nation and expectation and hope of the world people to reunify Korea independently and peacefully at an early date free from interference by outside forces according to the most just and realistic principles and proposals of national reunification set forth by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The great exploits the President performed will be immortal.
					
					 We extend the noblest reverence to the President on the occasion of July 8.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 They included remembrance meetings, photo and book exhibitions and film shows in Myanmar, Benin, Nigeria and Slovakia from June 29 to July 3.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerless great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "The Arch of Triumph" and "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation".
					
					 A vice-director of an education institute in Yangon, Myanmar said that the distinguished exploits performed by the President for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence would be kept forever in the hearts of not only the Korean people but progressive humankind.
					
					 The general director of a publishing house of Myanmar noted that the President made sure that the demand and desire of the people were realized, always finding himself among them, and pushed forward the revolution and construction by arousing their patriotic enthusiasm.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the chief of the Benin Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism stressed that the DPRK demonstrating its dignity as an invincible power and socialism centered on the popular masses would be unthinkable without the President.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in Benin.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Demise Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Newspapers
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers carried special write-ups and articles to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The Lao paper Congtap Pasason Lao on July 3 carried a special article titled "Prominent leader in 20th century" with the portrait of the smiling President. 
					
					 The paper said it is twenty years since he passed away but he is always alive in the hearts of all people as the prominent leader representing the 20th century. 
					
					 The Thai paper Xing San Daily on July 3 devoted one whole page to a special article titled "Eternal sun of Juche" with the portrait of the smiling President. 
					
					 It said that the world people praise the President as the eternal sun of Juche. 
					
					 The Myanmar paper The New Age on June 28 carried an article titled "Father of people" under the headline "Highest tribute to HE President Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people, on July 8, 2014, the 20th anniversary of his demise" together with the portrait of the smiling President. 
					
					 The Bangladeshi paper Bangla Times on July 1 carried articles on his exploits.

articles.title: Articles on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Posted by Foreign Organizations on Their Websites
articles.content:
Articles on Kim Il Sung's Exploits Posted by Foreign Organizations on Their Websites
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted on their websites special articles from June 28 to July 1 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK edited an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, benevolent image" with the portrait of the smiling President. 
					
					 The article said:
					
					 What comes to our minds first when remembering President Kim Il Sung is his benevolent image with a broad smile on his face.
					
					 His sunny smile which makes everyone feel easy and pleasant is the expression of the truest love for mankind and outstanding humanity.
					
					 The President warmly treated people and took care of them with paternal love with a broad smile on his face. This was peculiar to the President as a great man. 
					
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted an article titled "Eternal President" together with the portrait of the smiling President and a video dealing with his revolutionary activities. 
					
					 The article said that the 80 odd year-long life of the President was the one of a great man who created the Juche idea, successfully hewed out the destiny of the Korean nation under the banner of the idea and performed immortal exploits for the socialist cause and the cause of global independence. 
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in an article said the august name of the President precisely means the sun and his august name will shine long as the sun. 
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship posted articles under the title "President Kim Il Sung seen by Billy Graham" which said that the exploits of the President for the socialist construction in the DPRK, the cause of independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and the human cause of independence will be immortal. 
					
					 The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea posted an article praising the exploits he performed for the reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in DR Congo
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Cedi Publishing House of DR Congo.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary feats performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il all their lives.
					
					 It also clarifies the tasks to firmly defend their ideas and feats and add eternal brilliance to them.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place on July 2.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Poland
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Szczecin Publishing House of Poland on July 1.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and the noble career of leader Kim Jong Il dedicated to the country and its people.
					
					 It clarifies the important matters arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
articles.content:
Korean Film Shows Held in Different Countries
Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Film shows were held by the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo, and at the MCMC Company of Malaysia, Phoenix Food Company and Universal Surveying Company of Thailand, the Ministry of Land Survey in Yobe State of Nigeria and a food company in Lagos on July 3 and 4 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Films shown included "Arms of Korea," "The Arch of Triumph". 
					
					 The secretary general of the People's Party for the Reconstruction and Democracy of DR Congo said that thanks to the leadership of Kim Il Sung a great change like today's has been made and society of the DPRK became an ideal one to be followed by the world people. 
					
					 The director of the MCMC Company of Malaysia said the DPRK could become a country of single-minded unity and a powerful country no one dares provoke as it was led by the President. 
					
					 The directors of the Phoenix Food Company and Universal Surveying Company of Thailand said that the exploits the President performed for the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence will be kept in the hearts of mankind forever. 
					
					 The permanent secretary of the Ministry of Land Survey in Yobe State of Nigeria and other speakers paid the highest tribute to the President. They expressed belief that the Korean people would successfully inherit and accomplish the cause of the President under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre campo de construccion de Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea dirigio en el terreno el campo de construccion de la terminal del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang.
					Tras escuchar la explicacion ante la vista a vuelo de pajaro, el plano de una figura cubica y el plano del edificio, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un averiguo el estado de construccion, recorriendo el interior y exterior de la segunda terminal del aeropuerto.
					
					Elogio a los constructores militares que construyen bien segun la intencion del Partido, se puso alegre diciendo que ellos hicieron mucho trabajo, y presento las tareas y remedios  para concluir la construccion.
					
					Dijo que la estacion  del Aeropuerto Internacional de Pyongyang es la puerta de Pyongyang y la figura del pais y exhorto a erguirla como digno edificio de la epoca del PTC conveniente al aspecto del pais civilizado socialista, en cuanto a la forma y el contenido de la arquitectura.
					
					Subrayo la importancia de mantener perfectamente el caracter jucheano en la arquitectura y ordeno acabar la construccion, exaltando la nacionalidad e introduciendo la tendencia internacionaly las cosas buenas de los otros paises.
					
					Hay que construir perfectamente los salones de llegada, tramitacion de partida y espera, las salas de descanso y entrevista y el comedor, tanto en la estetica arquitectonica como en artes figurativas, al asegurar en el maximo nivel la comodidad de los pasajeros, dijo.
					
					Subrayando la necesidad de modernizar todas las instalaciones de la segunda terminal, construir con peculiaridad todos los puntos de servicio y preparar con anticipacion las actividades de servicio, el Mariscal Kim Jong Un aclaro la medida para organizar la plantilla y detalladas tareas y remedios para mejorar las actividades de servicio.
					
					Hay que construir en la zona alrededor de la estacion del aeropuerto, mas instalaciones de servicio inclusive el hotel y la parada de autobus y acelerar la labor para renovar la figura de la zona de Sunan donde esta enclavada la estacion aerea, agrego.
					
					Para terminar a tiempo la construccion de la segunda terminal del aeropuerto, los constructores militares deben elevar su responsabilidad y papel y el Consejo de Ministros, los ministerios y los organos centrales deben apoyar material y espiritualmente.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un senalo que esta obra es el objeto apreciado mucho por el Partido y expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los militares construiran perfectamente el edifico de estacion del aeropuerto como monumento de la epoca de Songun al acelerar cualitativamente el trabajo planeado.
					
					El Mariscal fue acompanado por el vicemariscal del EPC Hwang Pyong So, jefe de la Direccion Politica General del EPC y el teniente general de las fuerzas terrestres Ma Won Chun, director de diseno del CDN.

articles.title: Ceremonia funeral de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Ceremonia funeral de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en esta capital la ceremonia funeral de caracter nacional del difunto Jon Pyong Ho, general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea y director honorario del Museo de Armas del EPC. 
					En la ceremonia funeral participaron Kim Yong Nam, Hwang Pyong So y otros miembros del Comite Funerario Estatal, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido y las fuerzas armadas, el Conejo de Ministros, la rama de la industria para la defensa nacional y el Comite del PTC en la Ciudad de Pyongyang, y los familiares del difunto.
					
					Los miembros del CFE y los familiares del difunto guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto.
					
					El carro con feretro del difunto partio hacia el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos en medio  de la interpretacion del canto funebre.
					
					Los peatones capitalinos expresaron profundas condolencias por el fallecimiento de Jon Pyong Ho quien con gran fidelidad al partido y al lider lucho con abnegacion hasta el ultimo momento de su vida por la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun. 
					
					Tuvo lugar la ceremonia de despedida en susodicho cementerio. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra de condolencias, el general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del EPC Hyon Yong Chol, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, dijo que es una gran perdida para el PTC y el pueblo coreano el fallecimiento de un veterano revolucionario como Jon Pyong Ho en estos momentos en que bajo la guia del Songun del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se manifiestan plenamente a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y se abre una radiante perspectiva ante la revolucion coreana. 
					
					Aunque fallecio Jon, quedaran siempre sus proezas realizadas por el partido, la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, apunto. 
					
					Se enterraron los restos del difunto.
					
					Los familiares del difunto y los miembros del CFE cubrieron con tierra el feretro del difunto.
					
					Fue colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Tambien fueron puestas las otras en nombre del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central, del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la RPDC, la Direccion Politica General y el Estado Mayor General, del EPC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y otros organismos. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del difunto Jon Pyong Ho.

articles.title: Cuadros coreanos expresan condolencias ante el feretro de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
articles.content:
Cuadros coreanos expresan condolencias ante el feretro de difunto Jon Pyong Ho
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju y otros miembros del comite funerario estatal, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, la rama de industria para la defensa nacional e instituciones del partido y el poder en esta capital visitaron el feretro del difunto Jon Pyong Ho, general de ejercito de las fuerzas terrestres del Ejercito Popular de Corea y director honorario del Museo de Armas del EPC, para expresar condolencias por su deceso. 
					Al pie del feretro estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Fueron depositadas las ofrendas florales a nombre del Comite Central y la Comision Militar Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el Comite de Defensa Nacional, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros, de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la Direccion Politica General del EPC, el Estado Mayor General del EPC, el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, la rama de industria de defensa nacional, las instituciones del partido y el poder y las fabricas de esta capital. 
					
					Los visitantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria de Jon Pyong Ho quien dedico toda la vida a la sagrada lucha por cumplir la causa revolucionaria del Juche, la del Songun, apoyando con fidelidad la direccion de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					Y expresaron profundas condolencias a los familiares del fallecido.

articles.title: Kang Sok Ju se reune con delegacion de parlamentarios japoneses
articles.content:
Kang Sok Ju se reune con delegacion de parlamentarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- El secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y asesor de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon, Kang Sok Ju, departio el dia 11 con la delegacion de los parlamentarios japoneses encabezada por el senador Kanji Inoki, de visita en Corea.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y presidente de la Asociacion de Amistad Corea-Japon, Pak Kun Gwang, y otros funcionarios, por la parte coreana, y por la japonesa, los parlamentarios por varios partidos politicos como representantes de la Dieta Kenta Matsunami, Takashi Ishizeki y Naoto Sakaguchi y senadores  Takayuki Shimizu y Taro Yamada y los miembros de la Asociacion de Comunidad de Deportes y Paz de Japon.

articles.title: Es inevitable la decadencia de EE.UU.: carta blanca de ACNC
articles.content:
Es inevitable la decadencia de EE.UU.: carta blanca de ACNC
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 11 la carta blanca titulada "Es inevitable la decadencia de Estados Unidos". 
					El texto resumido sigue: 
					
					Despues del fin de la guerra fria, partiendo de su ambicion de lograr la unipolarizacion, EE.UU. desato guerras por doquier del planeta y mancho la escena internacional con el despotismo y la politica unilateral. 
					
					En aquellos tiempos en que llegaba al climax el bushismo, los intelectuales y politicos conservadores norteamericanos preconizaron las sofisterias como "paz al estilo norteamericano" e "imperio americano". 
					
					Pero, ahora EE.UU. esta condenado al arruinamiento. 
					
					La administracion estadounidense demostro su intento hegemonico sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico diciendo que "el futuro de EE.UU. esta relacionado con la region de Asia-Pacifico y el futuro de esta depende de EE.UU. Ningun pais podra dominar esta region" (de acuerdo con el reporte de ITAR-TASS en enero de 2010).
					
					Este disparate provoco gran repudio y rechazo de los paises regionales. 
					
					En cuanto a la nueva estrategia norteamericana, las fuentes extranjeras informaron que el proyecto estrategico de Obama y el proceso de su ejecucion causan discrepancias no solo en el Congreso sino tambien en el interior del Partido Democratico. En sentido general, la estrategia de Obama tropieza con tres desafios: el desequilibrio de recursos naturales, el de fuerza mental y el de dinamica. 
					
					Por todas partes del mundo se debilita la posicion hegemonica de EE.UU. 
					
					La revista rusa Expert transmitio que "La superioridad militar de EE.UU. sera cohibida por los conflictos regionales en que se involucra este pais y desaparecera finalmente".
					
					Agrego que "se restringen los espacios de accion en que EE.UU. utilizaba a sus caprichos la alianza, la division, la discordia, la atraccion y otros medios en el trato de los problemas geopoliticos. Evidentemente, le hace falta la fuerza".
					
					Ahora EE.UU. se mantiene inactivo ante la guerra civil que azota a Iraq y se encuentra en dilema en el problema afgano. En el enfrentamiento frontal con Rusia en el problema de Ucrania, EE.UU. se encuentra en desventajas.
					
					Aunque esgrimio el garrote de sancion contra Rusia que muestra actitud intransigente de no conceder su interes nacional, China y la India se opusieron a las medidas de sancion.
					
					Debido al ambiente antiyanqui que se extiende rapido, EE.UU. es golpeado, aislado y rechazado en todas partes del mundo.  
					
					EE.UU. perdio hasta la confianza de los paises aliados.
					
					Todos los hechos demuestran claramente que el imperio yanqui esta pagando en el ambito mundial por las guerras desatadas por si mismo y sus actos de intervencion y se queda nominalmente su posicion de "superpotencia".
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. ha tomado el arma nuclear y el dolar como dos pilares para realizar su ambicion dominar el mundo.
					
					Pero la economia estadounidense, que se basa en el dolar, necesita fuertes medidas de socorro.
					
					La crisis financiera, que comenzo a azotar EE.UU. desde 2008, devino el factor que acelera la bancarrota.
					
					"El callejon no.1" sin salida es la "direccion" de la economia estadounidense.
					
					En cuanto a tal situacion economica, la organizacion internacional de estimacion de credito bajo el nivel de credito estatal de EE.UU. por primera vez en los 70 anos despues de su fundacion.
					
					Los medios extranjeros advirtieron que eso deviene golpe al "corazon" de la economia norteamericana y esta caera en la "segunda decadencia".
					
					Agregaron que ahora es para EE.UU. el tiempo de reflexionar sobre su modo de pensar y acciones de corte hegemonico.
					
					Pero ya se hizo tarde y la economia estadounidense esta vagabundeando como barco sin velas.
					
					La deuda estatal y el deficit presupuestario llegan al estado irreparable.
					
					Debido a la crisis financiera, el gobierno norteamericano sufre desde 2013 muchos casos traumatizados como barrera financiera, recorte de gastos automaticos de gobierno federal, cierre de las oficinas del gobierno y el impago de deudas.
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias, se debilita bruscamente la posicion del dolar.
					
					En el siglo XX, el dolar norteamericano perdio su valor al acoger la tercera crisis.
					
					En fin de cuentas, esta en colapso el actual sistema financiero internacional que tiene el dolar como moneda de base.
					
					Rusia se esfuerza mucho por expandir la zona del rublo.
					
					En el ano pasado, quedo firmado un convenio sobre el intercambio de divisas entre el Banco Popular de China y el Banco Central Europeo.
					
					Tras declarar la suspension de las transacciones de petroleo por US$ para hacer frente a la tenaz sancion financiera de EE.UU., el gobierno irani cobra desde 2012 algunas sumas provenientes de la exportacion de petroleo en monedas de los paises importadores.
					
					Por otra parte, BRICS trabaja intensamente para cumplir su consigna de construir un mundo mas igualitario e imparcial.
					
					Desde hace unos anos, los paises miembros de ALBA usan Sucre como medio comun de pago en el comercio exterior y preven introducirlo en todos los paises de America Latina.
					
					Los 5 paises africanos, situados en la parte occidental de Africa, decidieron la circulacion de moneda comun para fundar la zona de moneda de Africa Occidental.
					
					Entre tanto, los miembros de la Comunidad de Desarrollo de Africa Austral (SADC) publicaron el plan de instituir hasta el 2018 la moneda unica.
					
					Y los paises productores de petroleo del Golfo Persico discutieron la introduccion de moneda unica y en otras regiones del mundo se esfuerzan por el mismo fin.
					
					La tendencia multipolar en la rama financiera sacudira el viejo orden economico internacional, protagonizado por EE.UU., y dara paso al establecimiento de nuevo orden basado en la justicia, igualdad y democracia.
					
					Ya paso el tiempo en que EE.UU. controlaba la economia mundial con US$ y es una cuestion de tiempo el derrumbe del imperio de dolar.
					
					EE.UU. se hizo una sociedad deformada en la vida espiritual y cultural y la material.
					
					Los capitalistas norteamericanos divulgan la idea y la cultura de caracter reaccionario y el modo de vida burguesa para adormecer la conciencia independiente de las masas trabajadoras y convertirlas en esclavas del dinero.
					
					EE.UU. fundo hasta la "universidad de bandidos" y la "escuela de ladrones" en que se forman de modo sistematico los delincuentes.
					
					Los estadounidenses degenerados ideo-culturalmente cometen sin parar los crimenes horribles asociados con armas de fuego y narcoticos.
					
					Es deplorable la situacion de educacion de ese pais.
					
					La manifestacion anti-Wall Street de 2011, lucha anticapitalista de mayor envergadura en la historia de EE.UU., es el producto inevitable de las contradicciones sociales y clasistas agravadas al extremo.
					
					La deformada vida material y la ideologica y cultural empobrecida aceleran la destruccion de EE.UU.
					
					Los hechos demuestran claramente que se hace realidad el derrumbe del "imperio norteamericano".
